name: Encroachment
description:
Encroachment

For the first Indie Tales Jam : One Room

Use mouse to click and drag turret or target

Known bugs:
Sometimes multiple explosions will cause a lag
Sometimes the game over screen won't display when you die
Sometimes a collision won't register if you aren't moving (use this to cheat before it's fixed if you want)
The text on the start page is not the right size on mac (possibly other displays too)
